summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated July 26, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift times, and leave statuses for correctional officers and other personnel. The document appears to be a routine internal staffing schedule.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Assignments
events.description: Routine scheduling of correctional staff across various posts (e.g., SHU, Control, Lobby, Escort, Hospital) and shifts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is a routine staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 26, 2019.
It details shift assignments for over 100 correctional services staff across various posts including the Special Housing Unit (SHU), control rooms, lobbies, and hospital details.
The document records numerous staff status changes including sick leave, annual leave, LWOP (Leave Without Pay), AWOL, and shift swaps, authorized by supervisors with initials like KS, RW, and SJ.
The roster includes a recapitulation showing totals: 109 Correctional Services Staff, 9 Non-Correctional Services Staff, 27 Overtime Occurrences, and 3 Comp-time Occurrences for the day.
